Marketing Front-End AI Co-op (Spring 2026)
Full time
CAD Remote – ON
Req ID JR-042950
Apply Now 

Revvity | About Us

Revvity is a developer and provider of end-to-end solutions designed to help scientists, researchers, and clinicians solve the world’s greatest health challenges. We pair the enthusiasm of an industry disruptor with the experience of a longtime leader. Our team of 11,000+ colleagues from around the globe are vital to our success and the reason we’re able to push boundaries in pursuit of better human health.

Find your future at Revvity.

Overview:

We are looking for a passionate and driven Front-End AI Intern/Co-op to join our remote marketing team for Revvity Signals. This is an excellent opportunity to gain hands-on experience working on production-level B2B SaaS websites while leveraging AI tools to accelerate development workflows and enhance user experiences. You'll collaborate with experienced engineers, learn best practices in modern front-end development, and explore cutting-edge AI integration techniques for digital marketing processes.

As an intern/Co-op, you will contribute to building responsive, accessible, and high-performance user interfaces for real-world users while incorporating AI-powered features and utilizing AI development tools to maximize productivity. The intern/Co-op will work full time from January through May 2026 and have an opportunity to continue working through the summer.

Responsibilities:

Work on Marketing Website and assist in developing new user-facing features using HTML, CSS, JavaScript and modern front-end frameworks
Leverage AI coding assistants (e.g., GitHub Copilot, Claude, ChatGPT) to accelerate development, workflows and improve code quality
Integrate AI-powered features into web interfaces, such as chatbots, personalized content recommendations, or AI-driven search functionality
Refactor and write clean, reusable, and maintainable code with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Work closely with design and backend teams to implement intuitive UI/UX designs, including AI-enhanced user experiences
Experiment with prompt engineering to optimize AI tool outputs for development tasks
Optimize components for speed, accessibility, and cross-browser compatibility
Participate in team code reviews and agile development workflows
Document AI workflows and best practices for the team

Basic Qualifications:

Currently pursuing a bachelor's degree
AND six months of experience with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Experience with one front-end framework or library such as React, Vue, or Angular.
Experience using AI coding tools (GitHub Copilot, ChatGPT, Claude, Cursor, or similar) in development projects.

Preferred Qualifications:

A plus, if you've worked in Drupal
Experience using Git for version control
Basic understanding of AI/ML concepts and how AI can enhance web applications
Strong attention to detail and interest in creating high-quality user experiences
Ability to communicate clearly and work independently in a remote setting
Curiosity about emerging AI technologies and eagerness to learn
Experience building responsive and mobile-friendly layouts
Understanding of REST APIs and how front-end integrates with backend services, particularly AI/LLM APIs (OpenAI, Anthropic, etc.)
Familiarity with prompt engineering and optimizing AI interactions
Experience integrating third-party AI services (chatbots, content generation, image processing) into web applications
Knowledge of AI accessibility considerations and ethical AI implementation
Personal portfolio, GitHub profile, or side projects demonstrating your skills, especially projects featuring AI integration
Familiarity with analytics tools to measure AI feature performance and user engagement

What You Will Gain:

Mentorship and guidance from experienced developers on both traditional and AI-driven development
Hands-on experience with production AI implementations in a B2B SaaS environment
The chance to work on meaningful projects used by real users
Exposure to cutting-edge AI tools and technologies in a professional setting
Flexible working hours and fully remote experience
Certificate of internship and consideration for full-time roles after successful completion
Portfolio-worthy projects showcasing your AI integration skills
